ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Show_website__c = "http://." || Show_website__c = "N/A" || Show_website__c = "n/a" || Show_website__c = "TBC" || Show_website__c = "tbc" || Show_website__c = "TBD" || Show_website__c = "tbd" || Show_website__c == "Already Set Up" || Show_website__c == "already set up" || Show_website__c == "unknown" || Show_website__c = "."
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the Organiser web address. Data quality is important
